subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brandon Barnes had a two-run double off the Yankee veteran Andy Pettitte on Monday, but as Astros teammates in spring training in 2006, Pettitte had the upper hand.
snippet: Brandon Barnes had a two-run double off the Yankee veteran Andy Pettitte on Monday, but as Astros teammates in spring training in 2006, Pettitte had the upper hand.
